I am deeply grateful to Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi for making my pregnancy journey a wonderful experience. Your exceptional care and guidance have given me confidence and positivity throughout this special time. 
Your friendly nature and the utmost care you took in explaining things have been incredibly reassuring. Your kindness and responsiveness to all my queries have been truly comforting. 
Thank you for going extra miles sometimes just to make me comfortable and supporting me during some of my tough times. You've made a significant impact on my pregnancy journey,
Thank you for being an amazing doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Cervical Cerclage,Child Birth Education,
review:
We visited Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi Maam for the first time for the pregnancy check up. Our fist visit became the best visit as we were pretty impressed by the  friendliness and professionalism maam had. She did understand our condition and did listen to our whole lot of stories and various complications, and other issues with our previous miscarriages.

After 2 miscarriages previously and other issues with my wife's uterus we had lost a hope of having a child, but after meeting Meenakshi maam her expertise, calmness and her way of handling things gave us a lot of confidence and trust which gave us a positive vibe of being parents.

Meenakshi maam is very knowledgeable and the technique or methods she uses in her treatment are mindblowing and remarkable. The success stories what we experienced and heard about Maam are to a great extent and appreciable

Today we are proud to be parents of a baby boy and the only reason for this is because of Maam, she is one of the best doctor whom we have ever seen through our entire life. Her dedication, support and knowledge has brought a success and praises which cant be explained.

Maam did take a personal care of us and she was available to us 24/7 which no other doctors would do.  She has also helped us to overcome all the consequences  throughout our entire pregnancy journey. 

Words fall short to us and cant be explained. the support, affection, care, treatment which we got from Maam are never forgetable. We will always be thankful to Maam from bottom of our heart. I proudly with raised head say it was the best decision we made to consult Maam for our pregnancy journey and i would always ask or request people to consult maam for any pregnacy or fertility related issues and you will see a postive change, happiness and joy in ur life.

Once again thank you maam for what all you have done to us and our family. We will always be thankful to you and u will remain in our hearts forever.

May you have lots and lots of success and happiness  in your life as well as carrer.

Best wishes
Mamatha Sharath
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words mamatha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Child Birth Education,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: Last year in June, my husband and I visited Manipal Hospital to confirm my pregnancy. At that time, only Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi was available. Initially, I was unsure about continuing with the pregnancy, but she guided us about the disadvantages of late pregnancy in one's late 30s. Her advice convinced us, and we decided to proceed with the pregnancy. The first three months were a bit difficult for me, but Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi was always there to support and clear my doubts. She was very positive throughout my pregnancy and gave us many examples that motivated us. On January 22, 2024, I delivered a healthy baby girl. After delivery, I was experiencing a high fever, and I was unsure if I would be able to take care of my baby. But Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi treated me very well. Most importantly, she was always available on calls, emails, or messages. I would recommend Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi for pregnancy-related queries. It was the best experience I had.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am eager to express the profound impact that Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi has had on my life. Three years ago, on a Saturday, I sought her expertise for my PCOD concerns, and since that moment, she has become my unwavering choice for medical care. Over these past three years, my husband and I have navigated through immense challenges, including the heart-wrenching experience of a MTP with our first baby. Throughout this trying period, Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi stood by us, offering not only exceptional medical care but also invaluable emotional support.

On the joyous occasion of 15/11/2023, when our precious baby boy entered the world, my happiness transcended words. What made the moment even more special was hearing Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi remark, "I remember you guys visited me for the very first time on a Saturday." This demonstrated the extraordinary bond she had cultivated with us over the years.

I extend my heartfelt gratitude to Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi for her unwavering support throughout this journey. Her compassionate care has been a guiding light, and I am truly grateful for the positive impact she has had on our lives.

I had some complications during my delivery but Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi mam gave us all the hopes during the delivery and treated me so well. context: Pregnancy with PCOD,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Dr Vijaya Meenakshi is an amazing and incredible doctor. Above all she is a great human being. 

First and foremost- According to me personally, Dr Vijaya Meenakshi is one such doctor who is passionate about her profession. She's known for her expertise, calmness, patience and so on.

We visited her 1 year ago when we were trying to conceive and was diagnosed for PCOD. Frankly, our first visit itself was promising.


She is calm, polite , always smiling and positive. Her calm nature spreads a positive vibe. She is very patient , she always has answered all the queries we had and she cleared all our doubts throughout our visits. Her positive , honest and friendly approach is what made us choose her for our baby. Also she has provided her number for emergencies & she responded to all the msgs giving us solutions. 


We are also very impressed by her pace of treatment, medication methods, and more important is her tailor made treatments.

All thanks to her we welcomed our baby last month.

Thank you doctor !!

review: We visited to Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi for the first time in 2022 because we wanted to have a baby but had been trying for four years without success. All our tests were normal. From our first visit, we felt very comfortable with Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi. We trusted her a lot, and as we kept seeing her, we trusted her more and more. We decided to continue with her for the rest of the pregnancy journey, wishing we had chosen her from the beginning. We liked that she suggested natural methods *** ****** **** **** *********** *********** Eventually, I became pregnant, and my pregnancy went smoothly. We had a baby boy. I highly recommend Dr. Vijaya Meenakshi to anyone who wants a natural pregnancy without too many interventions. She has a lot of experience with normal deliveries, even in complicated cases. I also want to thank Manipal Hospital for their good care and the staff for always being helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had consulted Dr. D Vijaya Meenakshi for my first pregnancy and I am glad I made that decision. 
She is very friendly and has a very positive aura around her which helped me throughout my pregnancy. She always made me very comfortable with her calmness and made sure all of my queries are answered with logical reasoning. She is not only available in the hospital but also via mobile she helped us when we contacted her with our doubts during the pregnancy.
She advised to me to have all types of food in my diet and kept no restriction on the same, Of course, the food was supposed to be home cooked; mainly protein rich since it helps in the growth of baby weight. She is a very patient and humble doctor who will address all the queries in your mind automatically.  Most of her treatment is natural. She suggests lot of natural remedies to most of the complaints. She only prescribes medicines when it is absolutely necessary. She kept us informed on what to expect at every stage of the pregnancy. This helps us to be mentally and physically prepared. 
Overall I had a fabulous experience with my delivery with her.
Even post pregnancy I have been consulting her for my issues and she helps to calm me down and provide me a great resolution.
reply_text: Thank you so much mitali for your kind words.

review: Dr.D. Vijaya Meenakshi ** ** ****** ****** *** listens to patients very carefully to understand the case history, perform diagnosis and suggest next steps in terms of what must be done to achieve pregnancy.  *** ** *** ** *** **** ** *** *****, when it comes particularly to high-risk pregnancies. Her medicines dosages are just right and the positive effect can be seen in the patients in no time. Doctor has also been very great in monitoring the patient throughout the complete pregnancy cycle of ten months of the mother. Further, doctor also extends her support in case of any medical emergencies, irrespective of the time of the day, sometimes well beyond mid-nights. Doctor is also very friendly to approach and prompts clears all doubts that the couple have. Doctor is also an expert in performing delivery of baby, whether it is normal or c-section. We are very happy for having consulted with Dr D.Vijaya Meenakshi and strongly suggest any new patients / couple to consult with her for a life changing experience.

review:
We visited the doctor  due to an emergency (bleeding at end of first trimster), the next day we moved to whitefield. After we came out  of the doctor clinic we were fully satisfied with the treatment given, We were very happy that we had found a nice doctor for our second child.  In my personal experience , she was the FIRST DOCTOR to call us up the next day post treatment to check the health condition of my wife !!!!!!!  
Even though ours was always a high risk pregnancy, she always gave the correct treatment and never made us anxious. Every visit we make, we come back happy and confident. 
Very punctual, and also apologizes to you in case she is late. Very calm in her explanation of the issue, listens to your complaints patiently *** ****** ***** *** **** ********** Very very humble, down to earth *** ************* ******* 

We had to move to Chennai for pregnancy due to personal reasons, but the first 8 months of treatment we got from her showed her quality. 



Thank You Doctor.

Vineetha/Lakshmi Narasimhan

review: I am very much happy to have gone with Vijaya Meenakshi doctor for consultation. After troublesome first delivery , I was very much selective of the obgyn I had to go with during second pregnancy and delivery. I must say the Doctor very patiently listens to what we have to say and recommends only the required medicines/scans and will make us understand exactly what is expected from us for safe delivery . All the consultation phase was very comforting . I had gestational diabetes which terrified me as the numbers were too high . The kind of confidence , support and soothing words from the doctor are worth millions. Needless to say, delivery (mine was c section due to complications from early delivery ) was handled in the most appropriate way keeping in view of my health concerns . The complications I had before were taken into consideration and I donâ€™t face them in this delivery. Thanks to Doctor . A simple word with tons of emotions . I definitely STRONGLY recommend the doc from my experience . The perfect answer to a tensed and worried to-be-mom like me, to have all questions solved and all health concerns taken care of.
reply_text: Thanks Ramya for your feedback.
